comment: Well, for the record, the Presidential Alert came minutes early at :18 PM Central on my cellphone. It said; "Presidential Alert THIS IS A TEST of the National Wireless Emergency Alert System. No action is needed." What happens after this is anybody's guess.
amr:
# ::snt Well, for the record, the Presidential Alert came minutes early at :18 PM Central on my cellphone. It said; "Presidential Alert THIS IS A TEST of the National Wireless Emergency Alert System. No action is needed." What happens after this is anybody's guess.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / come-01
            :ARG1 (a / alert-01
                  :mod (p / president))
            :time (e / early
                  :op1 (d / date-entity
                        :time "15:18"
                        :timezone "Central"))
            :medium (c2 / cellphone
                  :poss (ii / i))
            :quant (m2 / multiple
                  :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (m3 / minute)))
            :purpose (r / record-01))
      :snt2 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / it)
            :ARG1 (t2 / TEST-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / alert-01
                        :mod p
                        :mod (t3 / this))
                  :ARG1 (s2 / system
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "National"
                              :op2 "Wireless"
                              :op3 "Emergency"
                              :op4 " Alert"
                              :op5 "System"))))
      :snt3 (g / guess-01
            :ARG0 (a3 / anybody)
            :ARG1 (e2 / event
                  :time (a4 / after
                        :op1 (t4 / this)))))

comment: This is bullshit, I am not seeing anything on my end. Whoever posted this should get hit with a bike lock then fucked with by the FBI
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / bullshit-01
            :ARG1 (t / this))
      :snt2 (s / see-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (a / anything
                  :location (e / end
                        :poss ii)))
      :snt3 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (h / hit-01
                  :ARG1 (w / whoever
                        :ARG0-of (p / post-01
                              :ARG1 (t2 / this)))
                  :ARG2 (l / lock
                        :mod (b2 / bike))
                  :time (t3 / then
                        :op1 (f / fuck-01
                              :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "FBI"))
                              :ARG1 w)))))
